text: Česká Lípa () is a town in the Liberec Region of the Czech Republic. It is the capital of the Česká Lípa District. About 37,000 people live there. == Twin towns == Česká Lípa is twinned with: * Bardejov, Slovakia * Bolesławiec, Poland * Mittweida, Germany * Molde, Norway * Uzhhorod, Ukraine == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Towns in the Czech Republic Category:Liberec Region
title: Česká Lípa
